data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bergamaschi, Antonio C. B., Cambra, Roberto A., Brothers, Denis J., Melo, Gabriel A. R. (2012): Lynchiatilla Casal, 1963 (Hymenoptera: Mutillidae): a new species from Brazil associated with Paroxystoglossa spiloptera Moure (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Halictinae), and notes on other species. Zootaxa 3548: 55-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282821
